title.rendered: Akuvox R20BX5 IP Video Intercom with 5 keys and RFID

content.rendered:
Features

  • IP connected Door Intercom
  • Integrated RFID Card Reader
  • Contactless NFC via Smartphone
  • IP65 protection rating
  • 5 x Call Buttons
  • Wide-angle camera: 110 °
  • Complies with SIP standard for easy integration in every SIP capable PBXes
  • Complies with ONVIF standard for easy integration with any network surveillance system

excerpt.rendered:
Akuvox R20BX Certified for outdoor usage and easy to install, Akuvox R20BX is a compact SIP video door phone with up to 5 call buttons. It is typically used in villas, houses and apartment buildings.

The R20BX  is a highly-compact, IP-connected door Intercom. It features up to 5 Call Buttons with Nameplates, high resolution color camera, RFID card reader and NFC contactless via smart phone for secure remote audio / video communication and door entry.

Using the latest IP connectivity technology, the Akuvox R20BX intercom  enables visual monitoring and one-to-one voice communication between residents & visitors and secure remote access; ideal for multi-dwelling units (MDUs), apartments, entrance gates and unmanned office receptions.

The built-in RFID reader allows for contactless, secure access using RFID cards or keyfobs.

The built-in NFC allows for contactless and secure access using NFC enabled smartphones
